metadata.title: CVE-2024-26677 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: rxrpc:Fix delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial number Fix theconstruction of delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial number as theycan't be used as an RTT reference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26677` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-259-generic - 4.4.0-259.293
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-259-generic - 4.4.0-259.293
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-259-lowlatency - 4.4.0-259.293
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
